GitHub

fortrabbit
custom error pages

Things will go wrong. We at fortrabbit like meaningful error messages. Here are our custom error pages for our PHP hosting platform. The syntax is hopefully valid HTML5.

Feel free to rip, mix & burn.

The pages have been built using Metalsmith.io static generator, have a look at the source.

  • 400
  • Temporarily offline
  • 403
  • 404
  • 408
  • 410
  • 401
  • 502
  • 503
  • 504
  • 505
  • fortrabbit maintenance
  • 500
•fortrabbit — PHPower to the PHPeople
